channel.title: CVE Feed for Combodo -- iTop
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Combodo -- iTop

item.title: CVE-2023-44396|2024-04-15T17:13:45.144Z -- combodo -- itop
item.description: iTop is an IT service management platform. Dashlet edits ajax endpoints can be used to produce XSS. Fixed in iTop 2.7.10, 3.0.4, and 3.1.1.
